turns.user_message: I'm searching for engaging cognitive exercises under $50, especially those focused on dementia prevention.

user_profile.name: Yuki Tanaka
user_profile.description: Yuki is a 67-year-old retired engineer from Japan with advanced technical skills. A creative thinker, he enjoys exploring cognitive exercises that stimulate the mind and promote mental health, especially those aimed at dementia prevention. With a balanced decision-making style and a preference for detailed information, Yuki approaches his interests at a relaxed pace in his home environment, taking the time to engage with new concepts visually.
